title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: South Park, night. A camera sits atop am ambulance transmiting the action as the ambulance speeds down a street. It ends up at Hall's Pass Hospital. The paramedics rush out and open the cargo doors, quickly take Cartman out and whisk him into Emergency while his mom remains seated anxiously inside the ambulance.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Be careful with my baby.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, inside. The paramedics reach the nurses' station and rush by

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: What have we got?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Not sure. It looks like a possible code five six!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kenny. Can't have Kenny.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: You're going to be okay, baby.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, operating room. Emergency personnel whisk Cartman into the room. Liane enters, but stays near the door

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Five me 50 cc's of ketamine, STAT. And get something for the kid, too.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Is he going to be okay??

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Let the doctor do his work, ma'am.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, a few hours later. Cartman is now in one of the recovery rooms with Liane at his side stroking him gently. He's on a respirator for the time being. The doctor enters the room slowly, but Liane notices and rises to meet him

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Doctor! Did you find out what's wrong with him?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm afraid he's... running out of time.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Why?? What's wrong with him??

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: It's his time. It's ...running out.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well what does he need?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: He needs to have more time.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: What can we do?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well, I suppose we could try a time transplant. I'll have to call in a specialist.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: It's going to be okay, baby. We're going to get you more time.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Ey Kenny! God-damn you Kenny!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Chef's house, day. Stan and Kyle go up to the front door and Kyle knocks. Chef opens up and sees them.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hello there, children.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Chef, Cartman is in the hospital. They think he might die.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yeah, and, we don't know whether or not we should care.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well what's wrong with him?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well, nobody seems to know, but we think it's because he drank Kenny's soul four weeks ago.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kenny's ashes were in an urn, and Cartman drank it, thinking it was chocolate milk mix.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Children, why didn't you tell me about this sooner?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well like we said, we didn't know whether or not we should care?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well you should. Cartman is your friend whether you like him or not! Now, come on! We've gotta get to that hospital!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, Cartman's recovery room. Dr. Doctor has returned

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: He's looking a little better today.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes, but his time is still getting weaker. It will give out soon unless we do something.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hey you guys! How's it goin'?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Cartman?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No, that's Kenny.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: What the hell are you assholes doing here?!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: That's Cartman.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh my God! Eric, how long have you been channelin' Kenny?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh, about a month.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Let's not validate his delusions.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kenny? Kenny, do you know what you need to get free?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: He's gone again.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Ms. Cartman, we need to get Cartman to a meeting room to speak with people who have crossed over.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: What?? That's preposterous! What this child needs is a time transplant!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: This hospital isn't gonna do any good. We need to take him to see John Edward.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hey, I've seen that guy. He has a TV show where he brings poeple on and talks to their dead relatives.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: That's right. We have to go see him in New York.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I warn you, Ms. Cartman. Your son's time could give out at any minute. He needs to be kept here where his time could be monitored.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oooh, what should I do? I'm playing roulette with my child's life!  Ooo wait, Hairspray is showing in New York, isn't it? Let's go there.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Good. You children need to come too. Eric needs all the support he can get right now.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: We're gong to New York?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: An airplane to New York, dawn. The plane is flying above the clouds

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Welcome aboard Flight 673 to New York. We are happy to show you a feature film during the flight. In a moment we'll be showing a preview.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh cool. We get to watch a movie?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Awesome!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: The preview

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Rob Shneider was an animal.  Then he was a woman.  And now Rob Schneider is...  a stapler.  And he's about to find out...  that being a stapler  is harder than it looks. Rob Schneider is... The Stapler.  Rated PG-13

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Weak!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Ha-heheheh.  That was Kenny laughing, not me.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: New York, the skyline. Chef, Liane, and the boys arrive at an HBC studio for John Edward

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: This must be the place.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay audience members, hi, welcome to the taping of the show.  It's all general seating in there, and just remember, Mr. Edward might not hear from the particular dead person you wanna talk to, so just... keep an open mind.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Don't worry, Eric. I'm sure he will be able to help you.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: John Edward's studio, show set. The seats are all filled up

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, John Edward.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Thank you, thank you. Alright let's get started.  'S coming from over here. 'S the name Mike mean anything to anybody? I'm getting um, I'm getting M-mike? Definitely an M, d'um, maybe Matt? Mike? Matt? Mi-mmm, Mi-Mike, m-Mary?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Mary was my mother!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay okay, and and she-she's she died?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes. Yeh-yes she did.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay, and she's telling me there's something about... the money. That the, the money is safe? Is that making sense?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: M-mm-m. Not really.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Must be from somewhere else in the audience, then. Uh, d'uh, money? Is someone el-

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Uh, over here please?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: We have a dead friend.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Uh d'eh'hm quiet, quiet down boys. It doesn't work that way. Uh, okay, I I'm getting ...someone now whose name is g-, a t-. It's an l-, it's a m-, it's k-.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kenny!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kenny says hi.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Wow!  wow...

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay, now I'm getting that Kenny ...died?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: We told you that.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: And, and this wasn't, this wasn't a good death. It was like a, it was a sad death. It was like a, it was like a death that made people sad. Does that make sense?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yee-yeah.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh, wow, that's incredible! Wow!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Look uh, Mr. Edward, can you just ask Kenny how we can get him out, please?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Doesn't work that way.  Now, Kenny is telling me that... you're his best friends, and he's in a ss-safe place.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No no, he's trapped in Cartman's body.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Ohh, there's somebody with him. Who's Kyle?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm Kyle.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh right. And uh, did an older woman pass, she's asking for Kyle? Maybe a grandma?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yeah. My Grandma.  She's here?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: She says there was something she asked you to do, and you're not doing it? She wants you to look for four white doves.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh my God!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh now she's sending me a P word. Maybe it's a puh-? Or a huh-?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: My Harry died last year!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh, it's comin' from over here.  I'm getting all kinds of voices today. Woo!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Heh hey wait a minute dude.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay now Harry. He's telling me... oh well, he's saying that you two used to... do things.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Mmm-hmm.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: And that those things involved... stuff?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: The things did involve stuff, yes.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: New York, outside John Edward's studio. Chef, Liane and the boys exit. Kyle is missing

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Aw man, I can't believe I got fooled by that asshole!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: He seemed better on TV?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yeah. They must edit his shows down on television to only show him getting mostly right answers.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Grandma's watching me. Always watching me.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Dude, you don't believe that guy talked to your grandma, do you?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Eric?  It must be his time. I think it's running out!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: We've got no choice. The only people I know now who might be able to help Eric are my parents. We'll have to take the next flight to Scotland.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: New York Airport, day. The kids, Chef and Liane are ready for their flights

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay children, this is your flight back to Colorado. Your parents are meeting you at the airport in Denver.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: We don't get to go to Scotland?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: It's too far and your parents want you back home.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh well. Good luck getting Kenny out of you, fatso.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Thanks, asshole.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Come on, we gotta catch our plane. You children get right on that plane now.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: This is the final boarding annoucenment for Flight 342 to Denver.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: That's us. Come on.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Four white birds!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Huh?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: There's four white birds!  This is what Grandma wants? She wants me to attend Jewleeard.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Dude, you were going to see four white birds eventually.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: So is it a coincidence that Grandma DID talk to me about going to Jewleeard someday?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes. Now, come on. Our plane is gonna leave.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm not going back.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: What??

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I have to join Jewleeard and make Grandma proud!  Tell my parents I'll call them.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kyle. No, Kyle! Aw crap!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: John Edward's estate, later. Stan arrives and goes to the front door. Needless to say, he didn't get on the plane either. He rings the bell and is greeted by the butler

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hey, uh, I need to talk to Mr. Edward, please.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: He doesn't do private readings.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm not here for a reading, I just need to ask him something real quick.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Alright, come on in.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: John Edward's estate, living room. Stan waits by the sofa

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Just wait here. I'll go fetch him.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Jesus Christ.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Here he is.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, John Edward.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Thank you, thank you.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hey uh, I need to ask you a big favor. You, you did a reading on my best friend and uh, well you kind of messed him up.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh.  The John Edward show is not liable for opinions and materials given for entertainment purposes only.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Look, my friend Kyle won't fly back home to Colorado. All I need you to do is just talk to him and tell him, you know, the whole talking to dead people isn't for real.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Maybe it is for real.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Right, but it's not. It's a trick you do and I need you to just let my friend Kyle know that so he can go on with his life.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Look, people have the right to be skeptical. I really hear voices in my head.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes. We all hear voices in our heads. It's called "intuition." Get over yourself and tell my friend it's just for fun.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Look, what I do doesn't hurt anybody. I give people closure and help them cope with life.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No, you give them false hope and a belief in something that isn't real.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: But I'm a psychic.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No dude, you're a douche.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm not a douche! What if I really believe that dead people talk to me?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Then you're a stupid douche

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I think I've had of your bullying me! Get out of my house or I'll runs upstairs, lock myself in my panic room and call the police!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm nine years old.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm not talking to your friend and I'm not a douche!  You'd better get out of my house, 'cause I'm gonna call the police!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: You are so a douche! I'm nominating you for the Biggest Douche in the Universe award, you douche!  Son of a bitch.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: An airplane to Scotland, day. The plane is flying above the clouds. In the cabin, Cartman sits between Chef and Liane

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hey Kenny! Shut up, Kenny! You shut up, fatass!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hang in there, sweetie. We'll be there soon.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Welcome aboard Scotland Air. Our trip to Edinburgh should take about twelve hours.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Twelve hours?? Jesus Christ!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: In the meantime we'd like to show you a complimentary film.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh, good.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Rob Schneider is a Wall Street executive With everything going for him.  Only problem is, he's about to become... a carrot!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm a carrot!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: It's 24-carrot comedy.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh ohh!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Rob Schneider is a Carrot. Rated PG-13.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh for the love of Christ.  I wanna watch, fat boy!  No, Kenny, it's not funny!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: The Jewleeard School, New York. Kyle approaches the school. Stan runs up to intercept him.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kyle! Kyle!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Don't try and stop me, Stan! This is what my grandma wants!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Look, I went and saw that John Edward guy. He's just a big douche.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: He's not a douche! He talked to my grandma!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kyle, you can't ruin your life based on what some douchey psychic said. They all just use a technique called "cold reading." They've used it for hundreds of years to make people believe them.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hey, whoa now. John Edward is for real.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No, he's not.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yeah. My sister told me he knew our mother's name and when she died.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: John Edward? Oh yeah, I heard he walked up to a guy on the street, and said his dead father wanted to say "Happy Birthday," and it WAS his birthday.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yeah kid, how do you explain that?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Alright, look. I'll show you. I just need a volunteer. How about you?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh-ho. Me?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay, I'm gonna pretend that a dead person is talking to me about you, okay?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay, watch, Kyle. Uh, it's an older man, someone very close to you.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: My father?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Does this month, November, hold a special significance?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: My birthday's in November!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Right, because he's saying, "Tell her 'Happy Brithday.'"

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh my God.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: See, Kyle? I just started with something really vague. I chose an older man because I'm betting that, based on this woman's age, her father is most likely dead. But if her father wasn't dead, I could still say it was some other older man.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well then how'd you know her birthday was in November?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I didn't. I just asked her if November meant anything. Her father could have died in November, or Thanksgiving could have been really special for them. But I go with the birthday and validate it now, as if I knew, by saying "He wishes you a Happy Birthday."

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: What else does he say?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay, I'll just use an old standard. He saying "the money. Stop worrying about the money."

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh my God! My sister and I have been fighting over his inheritance.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: That's amazing.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No it isn't! When a father dies, inheritance is usually an issue, and money is something everyone worries about.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: That sounds a little too coincidental.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes. There's only one explanation. This kid can communicate with the dead!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Wow!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: What?!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Do me next. I wanna talk to my mother.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Can you try to reach my grandfather.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No wait.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: You have to tell me if my sister's in a good place.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yeah, help me out too, 'k?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm next. I'm next.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hey, get out of my way!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Do me!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Kid, how would you like your own talking to the dead show?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Scotland, day, highlands. Night falls. Chef, Liane and Cartman arrive at the McElroy manor and Chef knocks on the door. Bagpipes that were playing stop. Mr. McElroy, Chef's dad, answers the door

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hi Pop.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Junior! Aw, son, it's good to see you now.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: These are my friends, the Cartmans.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well come on in out of the cold now. There's heavy fog on the moors tonight. Well, look what the cat dragged in, Nelly.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh, my baby come home!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Hi, Momma!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Lord, I thought you wasn't comin' till nine.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Mom, this is my friend, Ms. Cartman.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Please, call me Liane.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: So nice to have you here, Liane.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: And is this the children you told us about?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yeah, Pop. This is Eric.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well, let's see here now.  Mhm, mhm, mhm.  Yeup! There's definitely more than one children in there.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh dear.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Nelly, you best have at it now.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Oh Lord, and I just put the roast in the oven, too.  Ain't gonna have no time now to baste it. Don't nobody blame me, a woman can't bake no roast and do everything else at the same time. Can't say that the roast is gonna be terrible, maybe just a little dry. But I suppose we can make some extra gravy to take the dryness out later.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: "The Other Side"

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: At a vary young age one young boy learned he had a special gift. This is "The Other Side."

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Okay, listen to me. Listen very carefully. This is a trick that I am doing. Okay? Watch. All I'm gonna do is say a name that I'm gonna pick at random. Okay? They want me to acknowledge Pete, or Peter.

text: Yes! Yes, my Peter!

text: Wow!!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No! Stop clapping! All I did was pick a random name and wait for somebody in the audience to give a response. Now that I see that there's a lone woman crying, my instinct tells me Peter was her husband. So I say, "Peter was your husband?"

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes, yes! Yes, my husband Peter!

text: Wow!!

text: Oh wow!

text: Stop it! I didn't do anything!

text: You knew Peter was dead!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I didn't start by saying Peter is dead! I started by saying, "They want me to acknowledge Peter." That could have meant Peter was in the audience or that Peter was somebody's friend, or Peter had died. I couldn't be wrong, see? Now, I can look at this woman and see that she's fairly young, so odds are her husband was fairly young when he died. So I can say something like, "I'm getting that Peter's death was very untimely"

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes, it was.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Wow!!

text: Amazing!

text: Ask Peter if he knows my little Billy.

text: Okay. Let's back up.  Not literally!

text: McElroy manor, night. Nelly is still working on Cartman. He's laying on a bed, and Chef's dad helps in the exorcism

text: Oooo, that's the potatoes.

text: Well hold on the potatoes two seconds, woman!  The soul's comin' out hyuh! It's almost done. Alright, son. Now bring me the victim child!

text: From the creators of Der, and Tum Ta Tittaly Tum Ta Too, Rob Schneider is Da Derp Dee Derp Da Teetley Derpee Derpee Dumb. Rated PG-13.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: The Jewleeard School, New York. Kyle is studying. Stan approaches him with a stack of papers

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Here. Look, Kyle. I found tons of testimonials on the Internet saying that John Edward has the entire studio wired to hear what people are talking about before the show. And, he pays actors to be plants in the audience.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: You're just jealous he's a better psychic than you.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Fine, I give up! You wanna stay in New York?! Then go ahead!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: So, you think you can talk to dead people better than me, huh?!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No, I don't think either of us can.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: They told me your show is getting better ratings than mine, that you're saying I'm a fraud on your show! You'd better not ever call me a liar, or a fake, or a douche again, or else I'll sue you for slander!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm saying this to you, John Edward, you are a liar, you are a fake, and you are the biggest douche ever!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Everything I tell people is positive and gives them hope! How does that make me a douche?!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Because the big questions in life are tough: Why are we here? Where are we from? Where are we going? But if people believe in asshole douchey liars like you, we're never gonna find the real answer to those questions. You aren't just lying, you're slowing down the progress of all mankind, you douche!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'M NOT A DOUCHE! And I challenge you to a psychic showdown! I'll prove to the world that I'm psychic and you're not!

text: Fine, douche!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: I'm not a douche

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: The McElroy manor, night. Kenny's spirit is now in the living room flitting about. Thomas enters with a broom, swinging it around to capture it somehow

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Well come on, the soul's in here! It can't escape now.  It's goin' to the light! Unfortunately, it's the livin' room light.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: The John Edward studio

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, it's "Psychic Showdown." Here are John Edward, and Stan Marsh.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Thank you.  Alright, asshole! I know you're here to try to throw me off, so go ahead. Give my yoru best shot!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: No, I don't wanna talk to you. I wanna talk to the audience.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Wah-why?

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: You see, I learned something today. At first I thought you were all stupid, listening to this douche's advice, but now I understand that you're all here because you're scared. You're scared of death and he offers you some kind of understanding. You all want to believe in it so much, I know you do. You find comfort in the thought that your loved ones are floating around trying to talk to you, but thnk about it: Is that really what you want? To just be floating around after you die, having to talk to this asshole?  We need to recognize this stuff for what it is: magic tricks. Because whatever's really going on in life and in death is much more amazing than this douche.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Yes. Right. Yeah.

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: You're right, Stan. My Grandma isn't floating around, judging me and watching what I do. She's dead. Dead and gone forever.

text: Yeah.

text: I am Quagmar, and this is the Intergalactic BDIU Committee. Mr. Edward, it is my honor to inform you that you have been nominated for Biggest Douche In the Universe!

title: THE BIGGEST DOUCHE IN THE UNIVERSE
text: Rob Schneider is a somewhat popular comedic actor  who seemed to have it all,  until one day, he came across a pot roast,  and his life changed forever. Now he's sharing his body with an eight-year-old boy.  And he's about to find out  that being eight  ain't so great.  Rob Schneider is KENNY!  Rated PG-13.
